label: operatorParty
comment: A trade party who is an operator of this product handling process.
The operator party, such as terminal operator, service provider, network operator of this monitoring IOT device.
The party operating this logistics means of transport.

domainIncludes.comment: An object or system made or adapted for an IOT (Internet of Things) purpose such as to collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data especially when connected to a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events.
The device or method used to convey people, goods, animals or other objects from place to place.
